+%0A%0A%0A# %3E%3E%3E O objeto precisa ser criado ANTES do loop%0Awatch = Watch(0, 0, 0)%0A%0Awhile True:%0A    try:%0A        line = input().strip()%0A    except EOFError:%0A        break%0A%0A    if line == %22$end%22:%0A        break%0A%0A    if line == %22$show%22:%0A        print(watch)%0A    elif line.startswith(%22$set%22):%0A        _, h, m, s = line.split()%0A        watch.setHora(int(h))%0A        watch.setMinuto(int(m))%0A        watch.setSegundo(int(s))%0A    elif line.startswith(%22$init%22):%0A        _, h, m, s = line.split()%0A        watch = Watch(int(h), int(m), int(s))%0A    elif line == %22$next%22:%0A        watch.nextSecond()%0A
